title: Gorky Park
description: "Brilliant...One of the best books of the season."ASSOCIATED PRESSA triple murder in a Moscow amusement three corpses found frozen in the snow, faces and fingers missing. Chief homicide investigator Arkady Renko is brilliant, sensitive, honest, and cynical about everything except his profession. To identify the victims and uncover the truth, he must battle the KGB, FBI, and New York police as he performs the impossible--and tries to stay alive doing it.From the Paperback edition.
author: Martin Cruz Smith
